::Astral::

Astral nods, looking over the datapad. He wasn't a technitian, but he 
could see the advantages of having a repair station here instead of 
down underground or way in the Iron Fist.

"Allright," Astral says, wondering where they would get the material 
and remembering D's ship, which would definitely have more than 
enough parts for at least five of these repair stations, not that 
five was needed. "If we need any spare parts, a ship recently crashed 
on the mainland. We could go salvage it."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Wheeljack:::
> 
> Wheeljack: Zardus has instructed us to build a repair/recharge 
station from 
> CRs and materials from the old base.
> ::he hands Astral the datapad::
> Wheeljack: the technical stuff is on there.
